Summary: drifting grey star dull stopped ,shooting star added and stopped next to other
divs: Sighting DetailsApril 1985 I was working corrosion control in my squadron, at 3 am I was done and went to the tarmac and climbed up on an airplane. I watched the stars and noticed a high altitude drifting balloon I thought, yet it drifted oddly and bounced back and forth, then stopped overhead, bobbing back and forth, it came from the north east. Then I saw a meteor coming from the southwest direction from the horizon to overhead in less than 3 seconds and stopped next to the other object, They oscillated together for a while, I got scared and ran back to the hanger.
trends: There have been 66 other sightings in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around April 17th 1985
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
